import Nav from '../components/Nav'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Contact() { const C = { sage: '#6B9E80', forest: '#2A5741', lavender: '#B4A7D6', lavenderPale: '#F3F1F9', gray: '#6B7280', darkGray: '#1F2937', lightGray: '#F9FAFB' }; return (

Enterprise & Schools

); }
